item.description:
Get the espresso flowing, it is time for some more development!

If you are looking for a good introduction to practical JSP development look no further. Even with the wide range of development tools receiving a lot of hype right now Java Server Pages (JSP) are still a king in the world of web application development and offer an awesome set of components to help build solutions.

After getting up to speed through this introduction other frameworks that can be incorporated when developing JSP based solutions (JSF, Struts, Hibernate, etc). Come with an open mind and leave knowing the nuts and bolts of what it takes to develop great JSP solutions!

group.name: The Boston Computing Review Meetup Group

item.name: Java Server Pages and Beyond!
